channel.description: Recent content in yum on 迁移自(cnblogs.com/xiaobin-hlj80)

item.title: RHEL更换CentOS Yum
item.description: v7.x Red Hat Enterprise Linux7.x Yum Repo rpm -aq|grep yum|xargs rpm -e --nodeps rpm -ivh http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/centos/7.9.2009/os/x86_64/Packages/wget-1.14-18.el7_6.1.x86_64.rpm down: wget http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/centos/7.9.2009/os/x86_64/Packages/yum-metadata-parser-1.1.4-10.el7.x86_64.rpm wget http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/centos/7.9.2009/os/x86_64/Packages/yum-3.4.3-168.el7.centos.noarch.rpm wget http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/centos/7.9.2009/os/x86_64/Packages/yum-plugin-fastestmirror-1.1.31-54.el7_8.noarch.rpm install: rpm -ivh yum-metadata-parser-1.1.4-10.el7.x86_64.rpm rpm -ivh yum-3.4.3-168.el7.centos.noarch.rpm yum-plugin-fastestmirror-1.1.31-54.el7_8.noarch.rpm repo file /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo CentOS-Base.repo - cento7 # CentOS-Base.repo # # The mirror system uses the connecting IP address of the client and the # update status of each mirror to pick mirrors that are updated to and # geographically close to the client.
